definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Some of good men drained from the Russian Federation.
sentences.chinese: 一些優秀人才離開了俄羅斯聯邦。

sentences.english: The criminal jury system is included in criminal procedure in China and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 中國和俄羅斯聯邦在刑事訴訟中均存在刑事陪審制度。
